name: Flappy Bird 3D (Danidan)
description:
This game was made and designed as part of the Personal Portfolio course in CMGT at Saxion University.

This is a Flappy Bird clone, played from a different perspective. Collect coins and survive for as long as you can to get a high score. 

Controls:

  • SPACE or W or ↑ to Flap
  • A/D or ← /→ to strafe Left and Right
  • ESC to exit to menu
  • Mouse to navigate menu

Thanks to my playtesters:
